stev.kwikemart

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • stev.kwikemart.Item

  • public final class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    An item in a shopping list. Items can have a price, a short description, and are identified by a unique Universal Product Code (UPC).
    Author:
    Sylvain Hall√©

        Creates a new item.
        Parameters:
        upc - The Universal Product Code (UPC) for the item

        quantity - The quantity of the item
        retail_price - The retail price for this item, in dollars
